--- Rippersnapper ---

Rippersnapper blinks as a missile whizzes overhead. He coughs 
on the smoke, and turns to watch the missile, as another lands in 
between his feet, blasting him up... and down, on his head in the 
ground. He pops his head out, and falls down, struggling to rise 
again.



On 14 May 2001, at 3:42, Yanshosh@... wrote:

> ::Cledar/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer::
> Two missiles nearly hit Rixer, the bot
> turning to see a group firing at Cledar. He fires two missiles at
> Rippersnapper and runs toward Cledar to see if he was allright.
